rules_text:
Rhapsody {3}{W}{W} [i](Pay {3}{W}{W} to cast this as a 4/4, or as a sorcery to make it become a 4/4.)[/i]
Players can't search libraries unless they pay {X}, where X is Skytouch Distorter's power.
flavor_text: [i]“Don't think about the future, and just forget about the past.”[/i]
notes: Reach for the Sky — Social Distortion
